display_long_description:
PozeAR is an Augmented Reality martial arts training app.

We record the movements of **real experts performing real moves** using optical motion capture, then let you step into their shoes and learn pozes from your own perspective.

[media]

# FOR STUDENTS

* **Get motivated** with a scoring system, difficulty levels, and achievement medals.
* **Prepare for each move** using step-by-step yellow guides showing hand forms, body rotation, leg heights and more.
* **Aim each move** using the red target. The front of the target changes to show the type of strike you should use.
* **Follow fast movements** with the help of motion trails.
* **Hear your instructor** provide step-by-step audio instructions.
* **Two virtual, lifesize 3D instructors** are in-front and behind you at all times, performing the moves.
* **Fit your body** by adjusting height, arm lengths, leg lengths and more.
* **Analyse your performance** by watching a lifesize 3D replay of your actual moves. A true 'out of body' experience!

[media]

# FOR INSTRUCTORS

* **Free up instructors:** spend less time teaching patterns, more time helping students refine their technique and master more advanced skills.
* **Add variety to training:** rotate students through stations, some spending time in PozeAR, some one-on-one tuition, some group work.
* **Help students learn faster:** by teaching all moves from their own perspective, PozeAR capitialises on student's muscle memory. Without realising, students can learn a new pattern in as little as 30 minutes.

[media]

PozeAR is great for Kukkiwon Taekwondo Poomsae!
